data.text: @straps0n @origincanada @freethinkerftw @EricTopol @YaleMedicine @NatureBiotech @KrishnaswamyLab @VirusesImmunity @mkuchroo @fperrywilson @JcsHuang @Mila_Quebec It was already visible in the phase I/II studies of Pfizer.

@knigotnik @origincanada @freethinkerftw @EricTopol @YaleMedicine @NatureBiotech @KrishnaswamyLab @VirusesImmunity @mkuchroo @fperrywilson @JcsHuang @Mila_Quebec You have no idea what you're talking about. This is relative to COVID, and has nothing to do with HIV.

@roadapps23 @EricTopol @YaleMedicine @NatureBiotech @KrishnaswamyLab @VirusesImmunity @mkuchroo @fperrywilson @JcsHuang @Mila_Quebec Just to be clear, I was being cynical about the implications, rather than actually saying this is an explicit strategy
@knigotnik @straps0n @freethinkerftw @EricTopol @YaleMedicine @NatureBiotech @KrishnaswamyLab @VirusesImmunity @mkuchroo @fperrywilson @JcsHuang @Mila_Quebec This is the dumbest crap ive ever seen.

@roadapps23 @EricTopol @YaleMedicine @NatureBiotech @KrishnaswamyLab @VirusesImmunity @mkuchroo @fperrywilson @JcsHuang @Mila_Quebec Yeah, CDC approach to this is to remove restrictions, get everyone nice and infected, then see who dies, who is disabled, etc. Big experiment. Don't expect to see an ethics sign off

Enjoy! https://t.co/Zm2zqXruUC

@EricTopol @YaleMedicine @NatureBiotech @KrishnaswamyLab @VirusesImmunity @mkuchroo @fperrywilson @JcsHuang @Mila_Quebec When researchers drilled down to a more granular level they discovered that TH17, a helper T cell, was also associated with higher mortality when clustered with the immune system cells IL-17 and IFNG.
This can be a lead for looking up many Auto- immune diseases also.
